value.name: No easy fix for squatters: Communities look for new ways to combat persistent problem
value.description: An incident in Volcano has spurred discussions and concerns about people squatting in vacant, abandoned and deteriorated properties.

value.name: Defiant Ghosn pins hopes on French probes to clear his name
value.description: Auto magnate-turned-fugitive Carlos Ghosn is campaigning to clear his name, and hopes a visit by French investigators to his home in exile in Lebanon will be his first real opportunity to defend himself since the bombshell arrest that transformed him from a visionary to a prisoner overnight.

value.name: Former Winchester, Tn. Police Officer Arrested For Multiple Counts Of Rape, Sexual Battery
value.description: On Oct. 2, 12th District Attorney General J. Michael Taylor requested that the TBI to investigate Tristan Delacruz, 28, who was at that time a Winchester police officer, on sexual assault allegations.

value.name: Former South Pittsburg Police Officer Arrested On Assault Charges
value.description: At the request of 12 th District Attorney General J. Michael Taylor, on Oct. 10, TBI special agents began investigating then-South Pittsburg police officer Joshua Chance, on an allegation of assault.

value.name: Defiant Ghosn pins hopes on French probes to clear his name | Raleigh News & Observer
value.description: Fugitive ex-auto magnate Carlos Ghosn is campaigning to clear his name and hopes an upcoming hearing in Beirut with French investigators offers a chance to defend himself for the first time since his 2018 arrest in Japan.
